results.title: country school diary_07
results.brief_description: An anonymous digital dairy created by a young person as part of a day long workshop run by ACMI. Each diary is scripted and a voiceover recorded by the individual young person. Some diaries use photographs brought in by the participant, but the primary visual content is often black and white, ‘stock’ footage of a poetic nature. At no point should the creator or school be positively identified when screening this work.

results.title: Country of Islam
results.creator_credit: Churchill-Wexler Film Productions and Gunther V. Fritsch
results.brief_description: Provides a glimpse of the culture, economy and religion of Morocco as seen through the eyes of Mustafa, a Moslem boy who leaves his village home and journeys to a city to seek an education.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Churchill-Wexler Film Productions and Gunther V. Fritsch
